comment: Ammo (.38 Round) - Changes the projectile to Bloatfly larvae
Ammo (Fusion Core) - Increases charges to 1000 and doubles the weight
Ammo (Fusion Cell) - Makes them work like Fusion Cores with 30 charges
(NOTE - makes the power armor battery insert animation fail due to the isPowerarmorBattery keyword)
Ammo (.308 Round) - Makes it slightly heavier and more expensive
